overview: In the village of the Easter bunnies intense activity took place. Only 2 days to Easter and still so much work to do. But all of a sudden something disastrous happens. On Saturday before Easter, when the Easter bunnies looked after their eggs, they were scared to death. All eggs have been stolen. The bunnies were broken hearted: “If we don’t find the eggs no child will find an Easter egg this year”, Dad moaned. “And even worse: The children will not believe Easter bunnies are really existing”, Mom mentioned. “This must not happen, in no case”, grandpa says. But after a while Anna has an idea...
title: Im Tal der Osterhasen
